pageContext.claim: “So China is run by, really, a great leader. I think he's a great leader. He wants to do something. They lost over 3 million jobs in a very short period of time. A lot of companies have left China, and they're leaving China.”
pageContext.analysis: This is highly misleading, as there is little to no evidence supporting Trump's claim that China has lost millions of jobs due to the trade war with the United States or his claim that U.S. tariffs are spurring thousands of company closures in China.
